topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b0aeb36368723cbeab0700#post_54b0aeb36368723cbeab0700
That guy took part in an anti-Brony crusade allegedly over a mild *fictional* R34 blog. A slander crusade which attacked the artist and bullied several fan members. A big $%&#ing drama storm.
Though, I don't know what his position on this fandom is right now. But it's long history.

People have the right to express their opinions. But they have no right to assault other people over expressing something they don't agree with.

But I prefer to put this all in the past. Find reconciliation.
Love and Tolerate.
